//: Weapons that do not fall under a monster's material are placed here, usually the weapons that requires more than just a major monster material.
name: hunter's dagger
description: Made with ease of use in mind. Known for its combos but also its lack of power.

name: hunter's dagger+
description: Sword that uses only incredibly pure ore to improve offensive abilities.

name: assassin's dagger
description: Sword that uses only incredibly pure ore to improve offensive abilities.

name: buster sword
description: An improved iron sword for beginners. A capable weapon against all sorts of beasts.

name: buster sword+
description: Made from highly purified steel, improving attack. Can be further improved.

name: buster blade
description: Made from highly purified steel, improving attack. Can be further improved.

name: war hammer
description: Gains power according to its usage. Revel in its charged power! Lacks guard ability.

name: war hammer+
description: Crafted from pure iron, this large hammer boasts inproved attack power.

name: war mace
description: Crafted from pure iron, this large hammer boasts inproved attack power.

name: iron lance
description: A hard-to-handle lance. Has powerful thrust. Superior guard ability.

name: iron lance+
description: Uses only pure ore to improve offensive abilities. Its charge is outstanding.

name: steel lance
description: Uses only pure ore to improve offensive abilities. Its charge is outstanding.

name: twin dagger
description: Dual iron knives. No defense, but increases your number of attacks.

name: twin dagger+
description: Dual iron knives. No defense, but increases your number of attacks.

name: dual tomahawk
description: Two single-handed axes modified for dual-hand use. No defensive abilities.

name: dual tomahawk+
description: Two single-handed axes modified for dual-hand use. No defensive abilities.

name: chain blitz
description: Experimental technology for rapidly firing functions.

name: bone shooter
description: The best learner's heavy bowgun in this difficult class. wide compatibility.

name: bone kris
description: Every bit as strong as iron, this bone sword is good for combo attacks.

name: bone kris+
description: Improve bone sword. Very durable, and its materials are easily found.

name: chief kris
description: Improve bone sword. Very durable, and its materials are easily found.

name: bone blade
description: A great sword made from monster bone, it is capable in any kind of combat.

name: bone blade+
description: A great sword made from monster bone, it is capable in any kind of combat.

name: bone slasher
description: A great sword made from monster bone, it is capable in any kind of combat.

name: agito
description: A traditional great sword made from an abundance of high quality materials.

name: wyvern agito
description: A traditional great sword made from an abundance of high quality materials.

name: golem blade
description: A great sword made from a large bone. Made for the highly experienced.

name: golem blade+
description: A great sword made from a large bone. Made for the highly experienced.

name: bone club
description: An unidentifiable club-like weapon bone useful only for training purposes.

name: large bone club
description: An unidentifiable club-like weapon bone useful only for training purposes.

name: cyclo-hammer
description: Crafted from superior bone, this hammer boasts improved attack. The standard-bearer.

name: atlas hammer
description: Crafted from superior bone, this hammer boasts improved attack. The standard-bearer.

name: bull hammer
description: Hammer made from bullfango, a beast whose merciless charge is feared by hunters.

name: bull head hammer
description: Hammer made from bullfango, a beast whose merciless charge is feared by hunters.

name: bull tusk hammer
description: Hammer made from bullfango, a beast whose merciless charge is feared by hunters.

name: longhorn
description: Simple lance from a bundle of long bones. Strong guard and finishing move.

name: longhorn+
description: Uses only high quality bone materials to create a simple and strong lance.

name: long tusk
description: Uses only high quality bone materials to create a simple and strong lance.

name: wild bone lance
description: Lance made from boar materials. Fills users with vigor and offensive lust!

name: wild bone lance+
description: Lance made from boar materials. Fills users with vigor and offensive lust!

name: bulldrome spear
description: Contains the fierce soul of the bulldrome. Two tusks betray its beastly origin.

name: bone scythe
description: Dual scythes with elemental potential but poor defense.

name: bone scythe+
description: Dual scythes with elemental potential but poor defense.

name: chief scythe
description: Dual scythes with elemental potential but poor defense.

name: shooter's barrel
description: A light bowgun exotic to this village. Made for easy use in most places.

name: defender
description: A great sword that can also serve as a shield. Stresses defensive strength.

name: sentinel
description: A great sword that can also serve as a shield. Stresses defensive strength.

name: barbaroi blade
description: A great blade housing a raging inferno. The lightest swing ignites an epic blaze.

name: crimson goat
description: Elegant great sword with a blade wrapped in heat. Light swings cause dancing flames.

name: halberd
description: Doesn't stay sharp long, but possesses superior attack. A time-honored favorite.

name: judgment
description: Doesn't stay sharp long, but possesses superior attack. A time-honored favorite.

name: executioner
description: A bone axe with an enormous head. More likely to smash a skull than cut it off.

name: executioner+
description: A bone axe with an enormous head. More likely to smash a skull than cut it off.

name: barbaroi tusk
description: Improved bone lance. Treasured by the border dwelling hunters.

name: fragrance
description: Lance modelled after a flower bud. Matches a cute exterior with a fragrant odor.

name: order rapier
description: Rapier used by knights guarding the town. A symbol used to maintain order.

name: bone javelin
description: Lightweight bone spear. Easy to craft and easier to use, giving it many fans.

name: spiked spear
description: Lightweight bone spear. Easy to craft and easier to use, giving it many fans.

name: paralyzer
description: Uses thunderbugs to electrocute monsters and render them paralyzed.

name: trident
description: Uses thunderbugs to electrocute monsters and render them paralyzed.

name: meteor cannon
description: Heavy bowgun made of rare metal. Simple, yet it displays immense power.

name: ladybug cannon
description: Made of giant insect shell, its beautiful exterior hides great power.

name: frost edge
description: Made from ice crystals that have stood the test of time over many millennia.

name: freezing daggers
description: Fused large ice crystals make this better than ore-based swords.

name: snow venom
description: 'Impossible to use' ioprey materials make this ice and poison combo a reality.

name: snow venom+
description: 'Impossible to use' ioprey materials make this ice and poison combo a reality.

name: gunhammer prototype
description: Made in a distant town, this hammer is the subject of envy in many workshops.

name: dead revolver
description: Made using the latest wyverian technology. A masterpiece of workmanship.

name: sanctioned gunhammer
description: As a result of technological advancements, this weapon has increased attack power.

name: gatling lance
description: Made in a distant town, this lance is the subject of envy in many workshops.

name: gatling lance+
description: Made with the latest wyverian technology. An engineering masterpiece.

name: sanctioned gunlance
description: Gunlance revolver. Stresses attack strength above fire element.

name: ravager blade
description: An improved iron sword for beginners. A capable weapon against all sorts of beasts.

name: ravager blade+
description: An improved iron sword for beginners. A capable weapon against all sorts of beasts.

name: tactical blade
description: Superb sharpness and high attack power. An improved ravager blade.

name: chrome razor
description: As the name implies, it features A+ sharpness infused with poison.

name: iron striker
description: Enormous hammer made from a solid lump of iron. Incredible power.

name: iron striker+
description: A giant hammer often called a mass of steel. Boasts superhuman power.

name: anvil hammer
description: An anvil from the armory, re-forged into a massive hammer. Holds its sharpness.

name: onslaught hammer
description: Turns an anvil, the soul of a workshop, into a powerful hammer. High sharpness.

name: war stamp
description: Devoid of elemental powers, but capable of destruction. Can crush wyvern skull.

name: iron devil
description: Primitive weapon used before hammers became widely available.

name: anchor hammer
description: Enormous anchor-like hammer packed with a sailor's passion for the sea.

name: spiked hammer
description: Incorporates improved needleberry spikes that can be released when swung.

name: spiked hammer+
description: Incorporates improved needleberry spikes that can be released when swung.

name: skullcrusher
description: Inlaid with numerous fangs, this hammer could crush a wyvern's skull to dust.

name: skullcrusher+
description: Inlaid with numerous fangs, this hammer could crush a wyvern's skull to dust.

name: bone axe
description: Streamlined for swinging. Looks like an axe, but it's actually a hammer.

name: bone broadaxe
description: Streamlined for swinging. Looks like an axe, but it's actually a hammer.

name: bone great axe
description: Streamlined for swinging. Looks like an axe, but it's actually a hammer.

name: paladin lance
description: Iron lance made from high quantities of machalite ore. known for its large shield.

name: rampart
description: Iron lance made from high quantities of machalite ore. known for its large shield.

name: estoc
description: Bejeweled spear created by the forest elder. Functional and majestic.

name: valhalla
description: Bejeweled spear created by the forest elder. Functional and majestic.

name: native spear
description: A frontier monster hunter runs a business trading in these fine lances.

name: crystal hammer
description: Improved spiked hammer. Made via the generous use of expensive crystals.

name: dragonhead hammer
description: Large bone hammer with a shell from a wyvern's skull. Beautiful and deadly.

name: jail hammer
description: A hammer with caged thunderbugs. Its impact emits a disrupting electricity.

name: thunderbane
description: Uses the electro sac of a khezu to electrically charge the blade.

name: frightbane
description: Uses the electro sac of a khezu to electrically charge the blade.

name: dark lance
description: Made from hard hornetaur materials. Contains a numbing agent in its blade.

name: dark spear
description: Made from hard hornetaur materials. Contains a numbing agent in its blade.

name: insector
description: Dual swords that use rare materials and are difficult to forge. Non-elemental.

name: insector+
description: Dual swords that use rare materials and are difficult to forge. Non-elemental.

name: insect slicer
description: A pair of blade made with sole purpose - sharpness. No attributes, just sharp.

description: A pair of blade made with sole purpose - sharpness. No attributes, just sharp.

name: insect lord
description: A pair of blade made with sole purpose - sharpness. No attributes, just sharp.

name: injector cannon
description: A peculiar heavy bowgun prototype that uses certain type of ammo.

name: twin flames
description: With the fire attribute of fire wyverns in tow, one attack is sure to be deadly.

name: rapidcaster
description: Heavy bowgun optimized for rapid reloading. Mainly for low-level ammunition.

name: dual carapace
description: Sword made from 2 varieties of shell with a strong water element solution coating.

name: dual diablo
description: Dual Swords with superior defense and attack power. Cannot guard.

name: twin flames
description: With the fire attribute of fire wyverns in tow, one attack is sure to be deadly.

name: twin nails
description: Painful training is required to wield that which turns your arms into fire and ice.

name: ninja sword
description: Despite its short, thin blade, this small sword is useful in fighting wyverns.

name: dragonslayer
description: Legendary dragon-killer. "Wield me true, and you will cut dragon scale like silk."
